file_summary: This Java class, `VetTests`, is a unit test designed to verify the serialization capabilities of the `Vet` model class within the Spring PetClinic application. The primary purpose of this test is to ensure that a `Vet` object can be correctly serialized into a byte stream and then deserialized back into an identical `Vet` object. It creates an instance of `Vet`, populates its properties (first name, last name, and ID), serializes it using Spring's `SerializationUtils`, and then deserializes it back. Finally, it asserts that the properties of the original and deserialized `Vet` objects are identical, confirming that the serialization and deserialization process works as expected.
